characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: The KX139 Ta'unar Supremacy Armour may move over other units provided the do not have the FLY or TITANIC keyword, and so that the model finishes its move at least 1" away from an enemy model. It may only benefit from a cover save if more than half of the model is obscured. In addition, it may fire at models that are within 1" of it's base with any non-Macro weaponry.
